display_name: Sleep Habits (Sleep Heart Health Study Visit Two (SHHS2)): Fall asleep while a passenger in a car
description: 19. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep (not just "feel tired") in each of the following situations? (Check one box for each situation.  If you are never or rarely in the situation, please give your best guess for what would happen.)  d. Riding as a passenger in a car for an hour without a break.
